will have the unused front loops from the double_crochet around row showing also make sure that the working yarn doesn t come undone from its square by making it larger or placing a stitch marker into it insert the hook into the inactive square through the corresponding stitch and pull the loop from the active square through then make a single chain to secure 1 make a single_crochet into the back
